message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses lower. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for the product.

Bob, I understand your desire to keep costs down.  While the product is worth significantly more to me, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I believe this price fairly reflects the value you'll gain from it.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,750 for the product.
